description: The .700 Nitro Express is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  Its stupendous accuracy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.
//: Base damage of 110, balance reduction to roughly 80%.

description: The .700 Nitro Express is a very powerful rifle round designed for long-range use.  The "Nitro" in the name isn't very applicable to this blackpowder load, but it still has plenty of Express.
